newsitem.title: MOROCCO: Morocco c. bank absorbs 468 mln dirhams at auction.
newsitem.headline: Morocco c. bank absorbs 468 mln dirhams at auction.

text.p: Morocco's Bank al-Maghrib (central bank) withdrew 468 million dirhams from the money market for one week at its repurchase rate agreeement auction, a bank official said on Thursday.

The bank received bids totalling 3.880 billion dirhams but allocated only 2.700 billion dirhams at 6.5 percent interest rate. That was less than the 3.168 billion dirhams leaving the market, the bank said.
It satisfied 69.59 percent of the demand for liquidity.
The next auction is due in November 27, 1996.
